text: Tirumala is a genus of brush-footed butterflies erected by Frederic Moore in 1880. Its species are distributed in Africa, Asia, and Australia. ==Species== *Tirumala formosa (Godman, 1880) – forest monarch or beautiful tiger *Tirumala petiverana (Doubleday, [1847]) – African blue tiger *Tirumala gautama (Moore, 1877) – scarce blue tiger *Tirumala euploeomorpha (Howarth, Kawazoé & Sibatani, 1976) – crow tiger *Tirumala choaspes (Butler, 1866) *Tirumala limniace (Cramer, [1775]) – blue tiger *Tirumala septentrionis (Butler, 1874) – dark blue tiger *Tirumala hamata (MacLeay, 1826) – dark blue tiger, blue wanderer, or blue tiger *Tirumala ishmoides Moore, 1883 *Tirumala alba Chou & Gu, 1994 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Taxa named by Frederic Moore Category:Butterfly genera
title: Tirumala (butterfly)
